content.rendered:
The Mimosa A5 access point delivers cutting-edge multipoint technology for service providers to affordably deliver the industry’s first scalable gigabit wireless broadband network. Capable of delivering the speed business users and consumers need at a fraction of the cost of delivering fiber to the premise.

   Features

  • 5GHz Radio Rate – 1.5Gbps
  • Antenna Design – Omni
  • Antenna Frequency – 4.9-6.2 GHz
  • Power Supply – External POE Adapter
  • Input Voltage – 48.56 V DC
  • Power Consumption – 25W
  • Polarization – Circular
